name: John Gilbert 0001
content: John R. Gilbert's home page John R. Gilbert Professor Emeritus Computer Science Department University of California Santa Barbara, CA 93106-5110 Email is the best way to reach me: gilbert@cs.ucsb.edu My research interests are in combinatorial scientific computing, high-performance graph algorithms, tools and software for computational science and engineering, and numerical linear algebra. Short bio Publications Talks Teaching GraphBLAS: Graphs in the language of linear algebra Combinatorial BLAS: High-performance graph primitives SuperLU: Sparse linear solvers Meshpart: Matlab graph partitioning toolbox
